\new Score
<<
    \context Staff = "piano"
    \with
    {
        instrumentName = #"piano"
    }
    {
        <<
            \context Voice = "voiceOne"
            {
                \time 4/4
                \clef "treble"
                \tweak style #'cross
                c'4
                - \staccato
                c'4
                - \staccato
                <
                    \tweak style #'cross
                    c'
                    \tweak style #'xcircle
                    f'
                >4
                c'4
                - \tenuto
                - \accent
            }
            \context Voice = "TempoVoice"
            {
                \tempo 4=60
                s1
            }
        >>
    }
>>
